channel.title: Automation on Cisco Skills
channel.description: Recent content in Automation on Cisco Skills

item.title: Automation Dance
item.description: I keep doing the automation dance, (yeah...that's me) there are a lot of different tooling products out there. I have been trying to understand a use case around using it with network automation. Recently I have been dancing around with Ansible. My personal belief is that using any type of these tools would be helpful but it can be a steep learning curve if you really don't have any programming knowledge.
